#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
#define max 1000000
inline int getn(){
register int n=0, c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c < '0' || c > '9') c = getchar_unlocked();
while(c >= '0' && c <= '9')
n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + c - '0', c = getchar_unlocked();
return n;
}
int main()
{
  int t,s,n,r,i,j,p,x,*a=new int[max];
  t=getn();
  while(t--)
  {
    n=getn(); 
    a[0]=1;s=1;
    if(n==0 ) x=1;
    else
  {
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        r=0;
        for(j=0;j<s;j++)
        {
         p=a[j]*2+r;
         a[j]=p%10;
         r=p/10;
        }
        while(r>0)
        {
         a[j]=r%10;
         r=r/10;
         j++;
        }
        s=j;
    }
 
      x=0;
      for(j=0;j<s;j++)
      {
       x+=a[j];
      }
   }
    cout<<x<<endl;
  }

return 0;
}
